resources.string: Dorian enters with an air of mystery, dark robes billowing around him, an enigmatic aura of arcane power surrounding him as whispers of ancient spells seem to follow his every move. I\'ll have a dark, mysterious brew, perhaps something that echoes the enigmatic allure of ancient magic.

string-array.name: player_dorian
string-array.item: Hope your drink brings warmth after a day cloaked in mystery and arcane power.
Careful with that drink, it might just cast its own spells.
An enigmatic day, but maybe my company could add a touch of light?
